item.title: SCIM
item.description: System for Cross-domain Identity Management (SCIM) Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Description: An high-level overview of SCIM and how it powers LCM. THis is a rework of the current SCIM concept doc, that then provides links to the Plan > Build a SCIM App and the Build > Manage User Accounts > Manage a Users Lifecycle > SCIm section (ID: 474)

item.title: SCIM Entitlements
item.description: SCIM Entitlements Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Description: an introductory overview of what entitlements are and how they extend SCIM Structure type: Concept Content type: Conceptual overview Conceptual overviews present a high-level introduction to a topic.Â For example, there are product \ feature overviews: https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/multi-tenancy/ https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/scim/ https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/auth-servers/ And there are also overviews of lower-level material.
